title: The Puffin
description: Puffins are seabirds known for their brightly colored beaks during the breeding season. They are often called 'sea parrots' because of their appearance and are excellent swimmers and divers.

questions.question: What is the primary food source for puffins?
Which of these is a unique characteristic of a puffin's beak?
options: It changes color with the seasons
It is filled with tiny teeth
It can extend to twice its length
It is used to dig burrows
questions.correct_answer: It changes color with the seasons

questions.question: What is the collective noun for a group of puffins?
Which of the following describes the nesting behavior of puffins?
options: They build nests on cliff ledges
They dig burrows in the ground to nest
They build nests out of twigs and leaves
questions.correct_answer: They dig burrows in the ground to nest

questions.question: What is the primary reason for a puffin's awkward walk on land?
options: Their feet are placed far back on their bodies
questions.correct_answer: Their feet are placed far back on their bodies
